Hello!
for those who like Esports or just sats stacks, there is an app called Stattrak where you can accumulate more LN satoshis and withdraw directly to your ZBD wallet for free. The link is below and any questions anyone has about it can call me or simply join the Zebedee server, good luck!

https://stattrak.gg
Cool! What games can you play? Is it PC only?
It is a Fantasy Game where you select a real tournament available, choose professional players and assemble a team following some rules and you are rewarded according to your ranking.
works on Android and IOS, but I have friends who play on desktop via emulators
i have accumulated thousands of satoshis and honestly i don't have much sense of esports (CS-GO, League of Legends and recently added PUBG tournaments)
It's really simple, I recommend it to everyone because it's free and it was released recently (February)
I would like to leave the link of the specific channel on the ZBD server, can I?
Sure!
here it is: https://discord.gg/7ny2RShRad
the specific channel is named #stattrak. to send messages in this channel you need to react to the pinned message, to send files you need to select your region

i don't work there but i feel so much better when i can help someone stack sats so anything i can help feel free to ask
thanks Phil ‚ö°

I believe works for ZBD or at least is affiliated with them. I tried playing CSGO the other day for the first time. Went 1-12 in the only match I played. I'm not used to Keyboard+Mouse for FPS games yet
I fully understand what you are saying. Infuse players are extremely hardworking
I tried to play a few times but I didn't adapt very well, I've been without a computer for a while and the only skill I have is in CS 1.6
do you know where the Stattrak tournaments are broadcast so we can cheer for our teams? One central location? Twitch?
Yes, exactly. I usually follow on Twitch. and when I don't have time to follow it live, I watch it on youtube by typing in the name of the tournament
in the ESL tournament the games take place simultaneously so there are two Twitch accounts
Great, thanks
Does Stattrak to StarCraft tournaments? I used to play that game
I will be reorganizing this channel and will create a thread here for next time. Thanks

Does anyone want to join an upcoming multiplayer game of Civilization VI with me and others? You must have (or be willing to acquire) Rise and Fall + Gathering Storm. Quick (330 turns) game speed, Casual turn timer (75 sec to 5+ min turns), standard map, we have 6 confirmed players and are looking for another person or two to add... Starting Thursday May 8, we'd have semi-often recurring 7-9pm or 630-930pm sessions on weekday evenings or weekend evenings respectively. Please let me know if you'd like to join, and I'll invite you to the Discord server.
This sounds super fun. I don't have any time to get into any more games though. But have fun!!
